data.text: Nuɓusɛi niiti ti ɠɛni ziɛzu kpidii zu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è ta-ɠoozunɛɛi zuwɔɔlɔa,
Eɠɛʋelei è kɛɛni la názuʋɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ kɔɔɠɔ zaʋalagi nii pɛ pogi ɠɛa yɛsu zooi ʋa,
Mazɔlɔɔ doun zɔlɔɔga ade ʋɛ,
Ná-masadai ɠoma ɠa wɔɔlɔ,
Maliɠii kpɔɛ woga Zakɔɓe mavofodaiti daalɔɠɔma,
Nuɓusɛiti pɛ kwɛɛ faa ɠa ɠɛ su,
«Ɓilikiiti ti loa,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa fɔnifaamai vea ti zili nui Lesin ya,
Siili nuiti ti folo ɠulazu ʋelei
Nuɓusɛiti ti la ɠaleni ma,
Naa ɠa é ba, folo ɠila nɔ
Kɛwolai ta seizumaanɛgi, ma ungi ɠana,
Niima nuɓusɛiti ta-lotuɠɔiti ta ti ɠakasu,
Naa ɠa é ba, Maliɠii la yeezɛlɛga ta-nu niinɛiti maazu,
Mazɔlɔɔ suɲɔi ɠa ɗa galai wo eɠɛ abui,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii ná-ziiɠaawanai zu,
Ti ɗa kpedagi wo yeezazuʋɛ, pului ti ma nɔ,
Manasé ɗa vala Efelayime ʋa,
